subject: Re: How to test private methods, its urgent
msgSnippet: hi: I think you can write some helpclass to help you. Sample: public class TestPrivateClass: { private testPrivateMethod() //you want to test { doSomthing....
messageBody:
hi:
I think you can write some helpclass to help you.
Sample:
public class TestPrivateClass:
{
private testPrivateMethod() //you want to test
{
doSomthing....
}
}
public class AhelperClass
{
public testPrivateMethod()
{
//copy TestPrivateClass pivate code to here.
}
}
you can use junit to test TestPrivateHelperClass not directly test TestPrivateClass.
So if AhelperClass testPrivateMethod is ok,then TestPrivateClass is right too.
Best regards.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
